text:
(a)     This program shall be administered by the Department of Human Services. The Executive Director shall establish rules and regulations for the proper administration of this Article. 
     (b)     In actual emergencies, the Executive Director of the Department of Human Services may make exceptions to this Article pending action by the Board of Supervisors. Such emergency exceptions shall be reported to the Board of Supervisors within five working days. 
(Added by Ord. 150-98, App. 5/8/98)
